text:
I receive this Marketplace submission flow error when trying to submit my Theme updates to the marketplace.

This error does not contain enough information to help me debug.

I've opened multiple support tickets to which I've been told they're "notifying the team" and then both ticket were closed.

My Theme customers are patiently waiting for this update - does anyone have a suggestion for how to bypass this Marketplace submission flow error?
Hey David - Iâ€™ll look into those support tickets and see what we can do about getting an update from our end out today. Thank you for your patience here
Happy to help out - please DM me if you need further assistance here
